Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' that are preceded by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Request Payment' in relation to total events in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by a new 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of 'Request Payment' in processes with 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' but without 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total 'Request Payment' done by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of 'Request Payment' over 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Occasions how often 'Request Payment' is performed after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: The ratio of 'Request Payment' that are not eventually followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Request Payment' made per year
Average number of 'Request Payment' in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'
